name: mini dragon amigurumi
notes:
please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi.com.

**free english version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/amigurumi-crochet-dragon-pattern
 
**free german version**
https://www.supergurumi.de/amigurumi-drache-haekeln

**free spanish version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/es/patron-de-crochet-dragon-amigurumi
		
**free french version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/fr/tutoriel-dragon-au-crochet-patron-amigurumi

**free dutch version**
https://www.supergurumi.com/nl/amigurumi-draak-haken-knuffel-haakpatroon

this little dragon can be crocheted relatively quickly and is perfect as a decorative figurine, gift or key chain.	
 
**about the pattern:**
	
• the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english (us terminology), german, spanish, french and dutch.
• the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated.	
• available as an instant download after purchase!	
• the finished dragon has a height of 5.5 cm.	
	
**materials used:**
 
this pattern was crocheted using the „schachenmayr catania“ yarn (100% cotton, meterage: 125 m, yarn ball weight: 50 g, yarn weight: sport - 5ply / fine (2)) in the following colors:
 
• black (schwarz (110))
• light blue (hellblau (173))
• ocean (ocean (400))
 
• 2.5 mm crochet hook
• tapestry needle
• polyfill
• scissors
• 6 mm safety eyes
 
**techniques you need to know:**
 
• slip knot
• magic ring
• chain stitch
• slip stitch
• single crochet (sc)
• half double crochet
• double crochet
• decrease / increase
• crochet into the front and back loop
• color change
• close openings
• sewing
 
***have fun crocheting!***
